channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: CBS News Presents: A Town Hall with Erika Kirk
item.description: Erika Kirk opens up about life, loss and political discourse after her husband Charlie's assassination. Watch the town hall, moderated by Bari Weiss.

item.title: Pentagon adopting Musk's Grok AI despite growing backlash against it
item.description: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth says the Pentagon will start using Elon Musk's AI chatbot Grok. The word comes days after Grok drew drew global outcry ...

item.title: WATCH: Police: Dense fog causes deadly 17 car pileup in Fresno, California
item.description: First responders pulled dozens from cars after police say that dense fog caused a deadly pileup crash on Highway 99 in Fresno, California.

item.title: Tensions flare in Minnesota as protesters and federal agents repeatedly square off
item.description: Days of demonstrations against immigration agents and a new lawsuit have left Minnesota tense. Federal authorities used tear gas on Monday to break up...

item.title: US carbon pollution rose in 2025. Experts blame cold winter, high natural gas prices, data centers
Maps show why Greenland is so important as the Arctic warms
item.description: As the Earth warms, new shipping routes from one side of the globe to the other are opening around Greenland, making the vast island a strategic prior...

item.title: WATCH: Video shows paraglider's terrifying plunge off Florida coast
item.description: Video shows the terrifying moment a paraglider took a 500-foot fall, splash-landing into the water off the Florida coast.

item.title: Democrats ask Trump administration if any Jan. 6 rioters are now working for ICE

item.title: Former U.S. Navy sailor gets more than 16 years for selling secrets to China
item.description: Patrick Wei, a former U.S. Navy sailor who sold manuals for ships and operating systems to an operative working for China, was sentenced to more than ...

item.title: Iran protests: 646 killed, activists say, as Trump weighs military action
item.description: The death toll over 16 days of mass anti-government protests in Iran reached 646 as of Monday, according to data published by the the U.S.-based HRANA...

item.title: People inside Iran describe heavy security in first calls to outside world
item.description: Iranians could call abroad on mobile phones for the first time since communications were halted during a crackdown on protests in which activists say ...

item.title: Mamdani 'outraged' after New York City Council employee detained by ICE
item.description: A New York City Council employee was detained during a "routine" immigration appointment on Long Island on Monday, according to city officials.

item.title: New video shows the minutes before immigration officer fatally shoots woman in Minneapolis
